data.lyric:
[ti:Call You Mine]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/Bebe Rexha]
[al:World War Joy...Call You Mine (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Call You Mine - The Chainsmokers/Bebe Rexha
[00:03.25]Lyrics by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Alexandra Tamposi/Andrew Wotman/Steve Mac/Tony Ann/Norman Whitfield
[00:06.50]Composed by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Alexandra Tamposi/Andrew Wotman/Steve Mac/Tony Ann/Norman Whitfield
[00:09.76]2 kids with their hearts on fire
[00:11.75]Who's gonna save us now
[00:14.30]When we thought that we couldn't get higher
[00:16.40]Things started looking down
[00:18.85]I look at you and you look at me
[00:20.67]Like nothing but strangers now
[00:23.55]2 kids with their hearts on fire
[00:25.57]Don't let it burn us out
[00:27.21]Think about what you believe in now
[00:30.12]Am I someone you cannot live without out
[00:32.38]Cause I know I don't wanna live without you
[00:35.57]Yeah
[00:36.46]Come on let's turn this all around
[00:39.48]Bring it all back to that bar downtown
[00:41.57]When you wouldn't let me walk out on you
[00:44.79]Yeah
[00:45.70]You said hey whatcha doing for the rest of your life
[00:50.22]And I said I don't even know what I'm doing tonight
[00:54.94]Went from one conversation to your lips on mine
[01:00.05]And you said I never regretted the day that I called you mine
[01:03.96]So I call you mine
[01:13.27]Can I call you mine
[01:18.58]And you said I never regretted the day that I called you mine
[01:23.52]Broke kids running through the city
[01:25.40]Drunk on the subway train
[01:28.17]Set free every time you kissed me
[01:30.25]We couldn't feel no pain
[01:32.62]You looked at me and I looked at you
[01:34.56]Like we'd never look away
[01:37.42]Broke kids running through the city
[01:39.33]Don't let the memory fade
[01:41.04]You said hey whatcha doing for the rest of your life
[01:45.65]And I said I don't even know what I'm doing tonight
[01:50.37]Went from one conversation to your lips on mine
[01:55.35]And you said I never regretted the day that I called you mine
[01:59.36]So I call you mine
[02:08.69]Can I call you mine
[02:13.96]And you said I never regretted the day that I called you mine
[02:18.07]Think about what you believe in now
[02:20.90]Am I someone you cannot live without
[02:23.22]Cause I know I don't wanna live without you
[02:26.44]Yeah
[02:27.24]Come on let's turn this all around
[02:30.27]Bring it all back to that bar downtown
[02:32.43]When you wouldn't let me walk out on you
[02:36.55]You said hey whatcha doing for the rest of your life
[02:40.99]And I said I don't even know what I'm doing tonight
[02:45.79]Went from one conversation to your lips on mine
[02:50.84]And you said I never regretted the day that I called you mine
[02:54.69]So I call you mine
[03:00.05]And you said I never regretted the day that I called you mine
[03:03.98]Can I call you mine
[03:13.26]Can I call you mine
[03:22.49]Can I call you mine
[03:31.71]Can I call you mine
data.trans:
[ti:Call You Mine]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/Bebe Rexha]
[al:World War Joy...Call You Mine (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.25]//
[00:06.50]//
[00:09.76]不过是两个为爱冲动的孩子啊
[00:11.75]此刻有谁能拯救我们呢
[00:14.30]原以为我们已经足够幸福
[00:16.40]谁料曾经激情开始褪却
[00:18.85]我凝视着你 你回望着我
[00:20.67]四目相对的我们像是陌生的过客
[00:23.55]不过是两个为爱冲动的孩子啊
[00:25.57]请不要让最后的爱焚毁殆尽
[00:27.21]就想想此刻你仍坚信的爱吧
[00:30.12]我是否还是你生命的全部意义？
[00:32.38]因为我知道没有你的生活我难以为继
[00:35.57]//
[00:36.46]拜托 就让我们竭力挽回吧
[00:39.48]让一切重回至我们在市中心那间酒吧的那刻吧
[00:41.57]那时的你不愿让我离开你
[00:44.79]//
[00:45.70]你问我 余生你有何计划
[00:50.22]我回道 我连今晚该做什么都不知道
[00:54.94]跟我对话的你的唇贴近了我的唇
[01:00.05]你说你不曾后悔你专属于我的那些时光
[01:03.96]所以我说你是我的专属
[01:13.27]我能说你是我的专属么？
[01:18.58]你说你不曾后悔你专属于我的那些时光
[01:23.52]心碎的我们游荡于霓虹之间
[01:25.40]醉倒于地铁上
[01:28.17]每次你亲吻我的时候 心仿佛不禁飞扬
[01:30.25]我们感受不到任何伤痛
[01:32.62]你注视着我 我凝视着你
[01:34.56]四目相对的我们像是谁也不曾移离目光
[01:37.42]心碎的我们游荡于霓虹之间
[01:39.33]请不要让我们的回忆沦为逝去的曾经
[01:41.04]你问我 余生你有何计划
[01:45.65]我回道 我连今晚该做什么都不知道
[01:50.37]跟我对话的你的唇贴近了我的唇
[01:55.35]你说你不曾后悔你专属于我的那些时光
[01:59.36]所以我说你是我的专属
[02:08.69]我能说你是我的专属么？
[02:13.96]你说你不曾后悔你专属于我的那些时光
[02:18.07]就想想此刻你仍坚信的爱吧
[02:20.90]我是否还是你生命的全部意义？
[02:23.22]因为我知道没有你的生活我难以为继
[02:26.44]//
[02:27.24]拜托 就让我们竭力挽回吧
[02:30.27]让一切重回至我们在市中心那间酒吧的那刻吧
[02:32.43]那时的你不愿让我离开你
[02:36.55]你问我 余生你有何计划
[02:40.99]我回道 我连今晚该做什么都不知道
[02:45.79]跟我对话的你的唇贴近了我的唇
[02:50.84]你说你不曾后悔你专属于我的那些时光
[02:54.69]所以我说你是我的专属
[03:00.05]你说你不曾后悔你专属于我的那些时光
[03:03.98]我能说你是我的专属么？
[03:13.26]我能说你是我的专属么？
[03:22.49]我能说你是我的专属么？
[03:31.71]我能说你是我的专属么？
